definition: lit. covering the mountains and the plains (idiom)/fig. as far as the eye can see/covering everything/omnipresent
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time

sentences.english: Standing on the hilltop, you can see beautiful flowers blanketing hill and dale.
sentences.chinese: 站在山顶上可以看到漫山遍野的山花。

sentences.english: But bureaucratism , the carapace that lends a country however child, all over the mountains and plains rises magnificently.
sentences.chinese: 但官僚主义，却借国家的壳子，漫山遍野雄壮起来。

sentences.english: Mixed in the mountains and plains of the four white variety of plants trees and shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 杂生的四白多种植物漫山遍野的乔灌木。

sentences.english: Thereafter, peace returned to Malan Mountain and Malan flowers blossomed everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 马兰山重新恢复了安宁，马兰花漫山遍野地开放。
漫山遍野都是盛开的梅花。
漫山遍野间有朵朵的落花。

sentences.english: Neat rows of grapevines are all over the hills.
sentences.chinese: 漫山遍野都是一排排整齐的葡萄藤。

sentences.english: The hills were inflamed with autumnal tints.
sentences.chinese: 秋色将漫山遍野染得一片火红。

definition: covering the whole land/over hills and dales
lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land; everywhere/as far as the eye can see
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
to stretch as far as the eye can see (idiom)
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
